turkish_example_sentence: Sen kayıp mavi çantayı bulsan hemen bana haber verirsin.
english_example_sentence: If you were to find the lost blue bag, you would immediately tell me.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты нашел потерянную синюю сумку, ты бы сразу мне сказал.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen kayıp mavi çantayı ______ hemen bana haber verirsin.
